name: Double Crossing 2
description:
Evict the ugly villagers! The long-awaited sequel to Double Crossing 1, now with more Godot! Use the arrow keys to move around, and the space bar to evict your villagers.

Programming: Lillian Wang (special thanks to HeartBeast)

Art: Rami Shreim, Rachel Lee, Thao Dinh, Tia Moore

Made during VGDC's 2020 Spring Game Jam.
